text: Water for Your Soul is the seventh studio album by English singer-songwriter Joss Stone. It was released on 31 July 2015 by her own label, Stone'd Records. ==Critical reception== Water for Your Soul received mixed to positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== ;Sample credits *"Harry's Symphony" contains samples from "Here I Come" by Barrington Levy, "Young Lover" by Cocoa Tea, "Be Careful" by Matthew McAnuff and "Bad Boys" by Inner Circle ==Charts== Chart (2015) Peak position German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 11 ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:Joss Stone albums Category:Reggae albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Water for Your Soul
